abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Discard the other 2 cards. This power can't be used if Infernape is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Search your discard pile for 8 [R] Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck. (This attack does nothing if you don't have 8 [R] Energy cards in your discard pile.)
